title: Where is the Snowdown Shop?
body:
Hi guys,

I don't have a tab to the snowdown offers from Riot, is this a bug? or are they just not out yet on OCE?
It is no where yo be found.

Thanks.

replies.body: tried next to the shop yet?
it was there earlier on today but wasn't loading anything...  then when i restarted the client, the button has vanished... is it still bugged or something? :(
yeah Its not next to the shop :/ really bummed about it

Yeah, I got this bug too, it just wasn't there but when I restarted, it came back :p
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
button and the shop just came back online guys
Like if they are having problems with it at least notify us that the snowdown shop will be taken down for whatever reason.
